info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 06 at 6:53PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Blizzard Warning, from Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds are expected to develop tonight into Wednesday and cause extensive blowing and drifting of snow. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
